column1: This macro draws Trafodion query execution plan(s) from one or
more log files containing plan descriptions, produced either directly by the
It is intended for "off-line" visualization of plans.

column4: Enter the following command to turn on logging:
To generate a shorthand plan description, enter the following
Or, enter the following command to generate output for the
Optionally, execute your query or enter any other commands,
which could include repeating steps b) and c) for other queries
Enter >>exit; to exit, or >>log; to stop logging.

column2: If you are using the FIXEXPLN tool, run FIXEXPLN against the log file
produced above, to produce the query plan description files.

column4: Press Ctrl+q to invoke this macro, or
use the Tools, Draw Trafodion Plan(s)  command.
You can close this documentation workbook at any time,
and still use Ctrl+q or the menu command to draw plans.
Select one or more log <file-name>s, or FIXEXPLN output
(*.QPD or *.QPD2) files, from the dialog box.

column6: The macro will start a new Workbook, and draw
all plans found in all selected files.

column2: You can print this documentation workbook by using the File, Print...
command, and choosing Entire Workbook in the Print What box.
If you close this documentation workbook, and later want to see it
again, use the Help, Trafodion Plan Drawer Documentation
